titleInfo.title: Letter, David L. Jones in Nashville, Tenn. to Andrew Jones in Allegheny City, Pa., 1865 May 16

mods.abstract: In this letter dated May 16, 1865, David L. Jones in Nashville, Tenn. writes to Andrew Jones in Allegheny City, Pa.about escorting Confederate soldiers back to their homes in Chattanooga via the railway, and talking to them about their families, long seperations, and having no news of their children for years. David admonishes his children to behave, help out their mother with the household and younger children.
